metadata.title: CVE-2024-26719 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nouveau: offload fence uevents work to workqueue This should break thedeadlock between the fctx lock and the irq lock. This offloads theprocessing off the work from the irq into a workqueue.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
